moves.name: Wrap
moves.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Twister
moves.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing team. It may also make targets flinch.

moves.name: Dragon Rage
moves.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.
